featured.text: However, the sea snake’s salt glands cannot handle the massive amounts of salt that would enter their bodies if they actually drank seawater.
Researchers believe that viewers are learning vicariously this way, picking up tips on how to handle threats in the real world.

definition.en_def: A part of an object designed for holding, moving, or controlling it; to manage or deal with something.
definition.example: Please handle the fragile items with care.
